elements.label: Hidden
elements.description: My Ally has secured an advantageous position in the shadows. [This Ally cannot be targeted by most Enemy actions, and its aspects have increased significantly. This Ally will revert to its normal state once used or injured.]

elements.label: A Nightmare
elements.description: A darkness from my past, come now to devour me. [Instead of expending Provisions, you must use a card with the Memory aspect to launch an attack against this Enemy. Additionally, when this Enemy strikes you, it will produce Mounting Dread rather than a Wound.]

elements.label: Neutral
elements.description: Not a friend, nor an enemy. [You might broker a temporary alliance with certain Neutral combatants by offering something of value.]

elements.label: Guard: Ingluviate
elements.description: This Enemy is protecting the voracious abomination that has swallowed my Key-Bearer. [This Enemy protects the Ingluviate.]

elements.label: Challenge
elements.description: To toss down the gauntlet; to demand satisfaction; to ask the enemy for his life.

elements.label: Immortal Assistance
elements.description: This one can help me fend off a truly terrifying foe if the need arises. [This Ally will not participate in any suicidal attacks.]
